chapter.title: Advantages of the Mobicents Sip Servlets Arquillian Framework
chapter.para: One of the most important advantage of the framework is the clear and concise model the framework provides.
The framework's main two parts, are individual and can be replaced by an equivalent module if needed, the sip client for example can be replaced with a user provided sip client.
Extensibility is a major advantage also. Since the framework is based on Arquillian users can take advantages of the Arquillian extensions, or use Arquillian SPI to provide their own extension.
